= vanilla | BrE vəˈnɪlə, AmE vəˈnɪlə | [[/wordsi|<-Back to List]] =
`普通的/寻常的`

A.noun

① uncountable (flavouring) 香草香精 xiāngcǎo xiāngjīng ; before noun 香草味的 xiāngcǎo wèi de ‹sauce, custard›

② countable (also vanilla pod) 香子兰豆 xiāngzǐlán dòu

③ uncountable and countable Botany 香子兰 xiāngzǐlán ; before noun 香子兰的 xiāngzǐlán de ‹plant, bean›

④ uncountable and countable (ice cream) 香草冰激凌 xiāngcǎo bīngjīlíng

B.adjective

(also plain vanilla) informal (ordinary) 普通的 pǔtōng de ‹product, version›
